author: UncleS_A_M
name: Zukityr Blue
description:
This is a mixture of the themes "Tyr Himinn" by bimsebasse and "Zukitwo" by zagortenay333. I have just changed the look of the panel in Tyr Himinn by adapting it to the look of zukitwo's panel.

Thus, all credits to bimsebasse and zagortenay333.

ChangeLog for Version 1.1:

Look of the panel depends on position (top or bottom)
